DOC.detailed_description: The purpose database explore long term outcome functional status patient undergo various type orthopaedic surgery . These data yield valuable database use address future research question . For example , three common surgical treatment medial osteoarthritis knee : tibial osteotomy , Oxford partial knee replacement , total knee replacement . No clear guideline exist regard treatment option optimal patient . By gather functional data patient undergone treatment , basis devise guideline .
DOC.criteria: All patient schedule undergo orthopaedic surgery eligible include database . Those patient meet inclusion criterion exclude study .
